description: Support to Environment and Sustainable Development in Belarus

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The aim of the project is to develop capacity for preparation and implementation of Local Agenda 21 in the regions of the Republic of Belarus. Planned activities include arrangement of informational and educational seminars, research, elaboration of printed materials, exchange of expertise with neighboring countries, support in the development of LA21 and “Greenways” strategies and dissemination of this experience throughout Belarus, provision of legislative support to state institutions in the area of local sustainable development
subproject.title: LA21-Greenways

subproject.description: The project aims to assist Belarus in developing domestic capacity to integrate effectively environmental concerns into national decision-making through introduction of strategic environmental assessment and enhancing environmental conventions implementation in the country.
donor_long: ORG FOR SECURITY AND COOPERATION IN EUR
subproject.title: SEA - Conventions

subproject.description: The project aims to assist Belarus in developing domestic capacity to integrate effectively environmental concerns into national decision-making through introduction of strategic environmental assessment and enhancing environmental conventions implementation in the country.
donor_long: ORG FOR SECURITY AND COOPERATION IN EUR
subproject.title: SEA - Conventions

subproject.description: To increase awareness of stakeholders, including civil society, in the field of NSDS-2020, LA-21 and Greenways; creating in informational basis for self-education and exchange of experience in the area of LA-21; at least 10 LA21 developed; local initiatives in sustainable development implemented with mini-grants; informational centres on sustainable development and LA21 created and operational in at least 5 regions; Mobile Expert Group created and operational; methodological basis in LA21 and Greenwats developed.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: GREENSCHOOL
